text: The files arrived encrypted via a secure folder. Anna decrypted them with a shared key from their college days. Inside was a high-resolution scan of the painting and a text file labeled ciphertrail.txt. After several hours of sifting through the image metadata and running analysis tools, Anna discovered a steganographic message that revealed a partial Bitcoin address: bc1q2gdf0hxk6e5nxp72cr9sv5uwx9a0gz0h3p9a4f. It didn't belong to Marcellus. She double-checked.
